pullrequest.title: Broadcaster publishes new and erased entities

content.raw:
This makes OSX sad:

~~~
/Users/jenkins/workspace/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/ign-gazebo/src/systems/SceneBroadcaster_TEST.cc:187:22: error: no viable constructor or deduction guide for deduction of template arguments of 'function'
  auto collectMsgs = std::function([&sceneMsgs](const msgs::Scene &_msg)
~~~
